title: veLi mayakkEdukkaDA
sahitya:
veLi mayakkEdukkaDA manidA punitA viDudalai peTruLLE keDudalai nIttOrkku


anupallavi

  oLi mayamAi vAnaveLiyil ulAviDum udaya sUriyan pOlE idaya parishuddharkku


caraNam    kAshi yAttirai sheidAl karma vinai pOghumO karaDi vaLarttAlE kaDum sinam sAgumO
dEshattilE haridAsanAit-toNDu sheyyum dhIrarukku tammai nivEditta nEsarkku
